modName: Dunmer Follower of Setvi - Vampire or Normal Edition - Skyrim
summary: Add a male Dunmer follower at the Riverwood Inn. Two editions: Vampire or not. The choice is ours.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#efefef][center][b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url][/size][/b][size=5]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67990-2-1444644960.png[/img]
Add a male Dunmer follower at the Riverwood Inn. Two editions: Vampire or not. The choice is ours.

Traits (From UESP)
Resist Fire ability: Dunmer blood gives 50% resistance to fire, constant
Height: 1
Dunmer start with the spells Sparks, Flames and Healing.

[/size][size=5]Skills (From UESP)
[/size][size=5][b][color=#efefef]+100 Destruction, [/color][/b][b][color=#efefef]Alchemy, Alteration, Illusion, Light Armor, Sneak.

Other:
Male, Dunmer, Follower, Riverwood Inn, Vampire and Normal Edition,
[/color][/b][/size][b][color=#efefef][size=5][b][color=#efefef]+100 Destruction, 
[/color][/b][b][color=#efefef]Alchemy, Alteration, Illusion, Light Armor, Sneak, 
[/color][/b][/size][b][color=#efefef][size=5]Spells Sparks, Flames and Healing, 
Essential, Can be marry (If you want to marry a Vampire), 
No DLC or anything required.

Thanks, Setvi.[/size][/color][/b][/color][/b][/center][/color][/b][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67018-0-1444587406.jpg[/img]
author: Setvi
